What're You Here For?

Saturday Morning Soulsborne

Cybernomicon

Topics

I work on character design and concept art for tabletop rpgs with my friends, one of which I am using to maintain a webcomic titled Tales From the Leyline Road, a sci-fi series set in the Fragged Empire universe some 10,000 years after humanity s demise. Come for the dramatic space opera, stay for the LoFi vibes.

Works

You can find most of my work on Instagram, although I’m looking to actually start selling prints and other things on Etsy and Redbubble. While I am an amateur barista with mostly onion shaped latte art, with the occasional archery session and am in the process of getting my HAM Radio license, I’m focusing on the Cybernomicon, Soulsborne Sketches, and Tales From the Leyline Road.
